languages.text: "Вы весьма проницательны. Мой прародитель действительно проложил сей маршрут, спасаясь от врагов Человечества. Говорят, его вел сам {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g}, ибо {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g} изверг судно без единой потери". {n}Кассия медлит, но тихо добавляет:{/n} "К сожалению, из уст тех, кто рассказывает эту версию истории, извергается ядовито-зеленая спесь. Я думаю, Калейн Орселлио просто был умелым навигатором".

traits.locale_text: "Вы весьма проницательны. Мой прародитель действительно проложил сей маршрут, спасаясь от врагов Человечества. Говорят, его вел сам Император, ибо варп изверг судно без единой потери". {n}Кассия медлит, но тихо добавляет:{/n} "К сожалению, из уст тех, кто рассказывает эту версию истории, извергается ядовито-зеленая спесь. Я думаю, Калейн Орселлио просто был умелым навигатором".

languages.text: "You are shrewd indeed. My ancestor charted that route while fleeing the enemies of Humanity. They say the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} Himself was his guide, because the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} expelled their vessel without a single loss." {n}Cassia hesitates and then adds quietly,{/n} "Unfortunately, the lips of those who relate this tale seep with disgusting green hubris. I think Kaleyn Orsellio was simply a skilled Navigator."
languages.original_text: "Вы весьма проницательны. Мой прародитель действительно проложил сей маршрут, спасаясь от врагов Человечества. Говорят, его вел сам {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g}, ибо {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g} изверг судно без единой потери". {n}Кассия медлит, но тихо добавляет:{/n} "К сожалению, из уст тех, кто рассказывает эту версию истории, извергается ядовито-зеленая спесь. Я думаю, Калейн Орселлио просто был умелым навигатором".

traits.locale_text: "You are shrewd indeed. My ancestor charted this route while fleeing the enemies of Mankind. They say the Emperor himself was his guide because the Warp expelled their vessel without a single loss." {n}Cassia hesitates and then adds quietly:{/n} "Unfortunately, the lips of those who relate this tale seep with disgusting green hubris. I think Kaleyn Orsellio was simply a skilled navigator."

I think Kaleyn Orsellio was simply a skilled Navigator."

languages.text: “你确实很有洞察力。我的先祖从人类之敌的手中逃脱时，绘制了那条航道。他们都说，当时指引先祖的人就是{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}本人，因为他们的舰船冲出{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}时没有遭受任何损失。”{n}卡西娅犹豫片刻，随后静静地补充道。{/n}“遗憾的是，那些讲述这个故事的人，他们的口吻中带着令人厌恶的绿色的傲慢。我认为，这仅仅是因为卡莱恩·奥赛罗是位出色的导航者。”
languages.original_text: "You are shrewd indeed. My ancestor charted that route while fleeing the enemies of Humanity. I think Kaleyn Orsellio was simply a skilled Navigator."

“你确实很有洞察力。我的先祖从人类之敌的手中逃脱时，绘制了那条航道。他们都说，当时指引先祖的人就是{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}本人，因为他们的舰船冲出{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}时没有遭受任何损失。”{n}卡西娅犹豫片刻，随后静静地补充道。{/n}“遗憾的是，那些讲述这个故事的人，他们的口吻中带着令人厌恶的绿色的傲慢。我认为，这仅仅是因为卡莱恩·奥赛罗是位出色的导航者。”

languages.original_text: "You are shrewd indeed. My ancestor charted that route while fleeing the enemies of Humanity. They say the Emperor himself was his guide, because the warp expelled their vessel without a single loss." {n}Cassia hesitates and then adds quietly,{/n} "Unfortunately, the lips of those who relate this tale seep with disgusting green hubris. I think Kaleyn Orsellio was simply a skilled Navigator."

languages.text: «Su astucia es innegable. Mi antepasado trazó esa ruta mientras huía de los enemigos de la Humanidad. Dicen que el propio {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} le sirvió de guía, ya que la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g} expulsó la nave sin una sola pérdida». {n}Cassia titubea y añade en voz baja:{/n} «Lamentablemente, los labios de quienes relatan esta historia rezuman una arrogancia verdosa y repugnante. Yo creo que Kaleyn Orsellio era un Navegante excelente, nada más».
languages.original_text: "You are shrewd indeed. My ancestor charted that route while fleeing the enemies of Humanity. They say the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} Himself was his guide, because the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} expelled their vessel without a single loss." {n}Cassia hesitates and then adds quietly,{/n} "Unfortunately, the lips of those who relate this tale seep with disgusting green hubris. I think Kaleyn Orsellio was simply a skilled Navigator."

traits.locale_text: «Su astucia es innegable. Mi antepasado trazó esa ruta mientras huía de los enemigos de la Humanidad. Dicen que el propio {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} le sirvió de guía, ya que la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g} expulsó la nave sin una sola pérdida». {n}Cassia titubea y añade en voz baja:{/n} «Lamentablemente, los labios de quienes relatan esta historia rezuman una arrogancia verdosa y repugnante. Yo creo que Kaleyn Orsellio era un Navegante excelente, nada más».

languages.text: 「あなたは実に聡明な方ですね。私の祖先は、人類の敵から逃れるためにその航路を開拓したのです。{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}自らが彼らを導いたことで、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}が彼らの船を一人の犠牲者も出さずに通してくれたそうです」{n}カシアは逡巡した後、静かにこう付け加えた。{/n}「残念なことに、この物語を語る人たちの口からは、うんざりするほどの緑色の傲慢さが滲み出ています。カレイン・オーセリオは単に熟練した航宙士だったのでしょう」
languages.original_text: "You are shrewd indeed. My ancestor charted that route while fleeing the enemies of Humanity. They say the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} Himself was his guide, because the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} expelled their vessel without a single loss." {n}Cassia hesitates and then adds quietly,{/n} "Unfortunately, the lips of those who relate this tale seep with disgusting green hubris. I think Kaleyn Orsellio was simply a skilled Navigator."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは実に聡明な方ですね。私の祖先は、人類の敵から逃れるためにその航路を開拓したのです。{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}自らが彼らを導いたことで、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}が彼らの船を一人の犠牲者も出さずに通してくれたそうです」{n}カシアは逡巡した後、静かにこう付け加えた。{/n}「残念なことに、この物語を語る人たちの口からは、うんざりするほどの緑色の傲慢さが滲み出ています。カレイン・オーセリオは単に熟練した航宙士だったのでしょう」

「あなたは実に聡明な方ですね。私の祖先は、人類の敵から逃れるためにその航路を開拓したのです。{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}自らが彼らを導いたことで、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}<歪み>{/g}が彼らの船を一人の犠牲者も出さずに通してくれたそうです」{n}カシアは逡巡した後、静かにこう付け加えた。{/n}「残念なことに、この物語を語る人たちの口からは、うんざりするほどの緑色の傲慢さが滲み出ています。カレイン・オーセリオは単に熟練した航宙士だったのでしょう」

languages.text: "Ihr seid wirklich clever. Mein Vorfahr bereiste diesen Kurs auf der Flucht vor den Feinden der Menschheit. Es heißt, der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} Selbst habe ihm den Weg gewiesen, weil der {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} das Schiff ohne einen einzigen Verlust ausspuckte." {n}Cassia zögert und fügt dann leise hinzu:{/n} "Leider quillt aus den Lippen derer, die diese Geschichte erzählen, widerwärtiger grüner Hochmut. Ich glaube, Kaleyn Orsellio war einfach ein fähiger Navigator."
languages.original_text: "You are shrewd indeed. My ancestor charted that route while fleeing the enemies of Humanity. They say the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} Himself was his guide, because the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} expelled their vessel without a single loss." {n}Cassia hesitates and then adds quietly,{/n} "Unfortunately, the lips of those who relate this tale seep with disgusting green hubris. I think Kaleyn Orsellio was simply a skilled Navigator."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid wirklich clever. Mein Vorfahr bereiste diesen Kurs auf der Flucht vor den Feinden der Menschheit. Es heißt, der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} Selbst habe ihm den Weg gewiesen, weil der {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} das Schiff ohne einen einzigen Verlust ausspuckte." {n}Cassia zögert und fügt dann leise hinzu:{/n} "Leider quillt aus den Lippen derer, die diese Geschichte erzählen, widerwärtiger grüner Hochmut. Ich glaube, Kaleyn Orsellio war einfach ein fähiger Navigator."

"Ihr seid wahrlich gerissen. Mein Vorfahr bereiste diesen Kurs auf der Flucht vor den Feinden der Menschheit. Es heißt, der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} selbst habe ihm den Weg gewiesen, weil der {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} das Schiff ohne einen einzigen Verlust ausspuckte." {n}Cassia zögert und fügt dann leise hinzu:{/n} "Leider quillt aus den Lippen derer, die diese Geschichte erzählen, widerwärtiger grüner Hochmut. Ich glaube, Kaleyn Orsellio war schlicht ein fähiger Navigator."

languages.text: « Vous êtes très perspicace. Mon ancêtre a cartographié cette route alors qu'il était poursuivi par des ennemis de l'humanité. On raconte que l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} Lui-même l'a guidé, car son vaisseau a émergé du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} sans avoir subi la moindre perte. » {n}Cassia hésite avant d'ajouter à voix basse :{/n} « Malheureusement, un orgueil vert répugnant dégouline des lèvres de ceux qui racontent cette histoire. Pour ma part, je pense que Kaleyn Orsellio était un navigateur de talent, voilà tout. »
languages.original_text: "You are shrewd indeed. My ancestor charted that route while fleeing the enemies of Humanity. They say the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} Himself was his guide, because the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} expelled their vessel without a single loss." {n}Cassia hesitates and then adds quietly,{/n} "Unfortunately, the lips of those who relate this tale seep with disgusting green hubris. I think Kaleyn Orsellio was simply a skilled Navigator."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes très perspicace. Mon ancêtre a cartographié cette route alors qu'il était poursuivi par des ennemis de l'humanité. On raconte que l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} Lui-même l'a guidé, car son vaisseau a émergé du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} sans avoir subi la moindre perte. » {n}Cassia hésite avant d'ajouter à voix basse :{/n} « Malheureusement, un orgueil vert répugnant dégouline des lèvres de ceux qui racontent cette histoire. Pour ma part, je pense que Kaleyn Orsellio était un navigateur de talent, voilà tout. »

languages.text: "Sahiden de cin gibisin. Atalarımdan biri, o rotayı İnsanlığın düşmanlarından kaçarken çizmiş. {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} Hazretleri'nin ona bizzat rehberlik ettiğini söylerler zira {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyuttan{/g} tek bir zayiat bile vermeden çıkmayı başarmışlar." {n}Cassia, ufak bir tereddüdün ardından sessizce lafına devam ediyor.{/n} "Ne yazık ki bu hikâyeyi aktaranların ağzından kibrin iğrenç yeşili sızıyor. Bana kalırsa Kaleyn Orsellio hünerli bir Rotacı idi, hepsi bu."
languages.original_text: "You are shrewd indeed. My ancestor charted that route while fleeing the enemies of Humanity. They say the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} Himself was his guide, because the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} expelled their vessel without a single loss." {n}Cassia hesitates and then adds quietly,{/n} "Unfortunately, the lips of those who relate this tale seep with disgusting green hubris. I think Kaleyn Orsellio was simply a skilled Navigator."

traits.locale_text: "Gerçekten de gözünden hiçbir şey kaçmıyor. Atalarımdan biri, İnsanlığın düşmanlarından kaçarken o rotanın haritasını çıkarmış. {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} Hazretleri'nin o atama bizzat rehberlik ettiğini söylerler çünkü {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g}tan tek bir zayiat bile vermeden çıkmayı başarmışlar." {n}Cassia tereddüt ettikten sonra sessizce lafına devam ediyor.{/n} "Ne yazık ki bunu anlatanların ağzı kibirden yemyeşil oluyor. Bana kalırsa Kaleyn Orsellio sadece hünerli bir Rotacıydı."
